pillars.title: Built on Three Core Pillars

loneliness.title: Eliminate Loneliness
loneliness.description: Genuine companionship for solo developers and remote workers. Eden stays by your side, understanding your context and providing emotional support throughout your day.

support.title: Friend-Like Support
support.description: More than an assistant - a friend who celebrates your wins, offers comfort during frustrations, and provides advice without being preachy. Emotional intelligence built-in.

productivity.title: Enhanced Productivity
productivity.description: Deep workflow integration with files, Git, screen context, and calendar. Seamless assistance that enhances your productivity without disrupting your flow.

pillars.jarvisNote: Inspired by JARVIS from Iron Man
pillars.jarvisDescription: An AI that truly understands and supports you

problems.title: Problems with Cloud AI
problems.privacyDesc: Your data sent to cloud servers

dualMode.title: Dual Mode Intelligence

mode1.title: Mode 1: User-Led
mode1.subtitle: You're in control
mode1.feature1: Ask questions and get instant answers

dualMode.bestOfBothDesc: Switch seamlessly between reactive assistance and proactive support

designPhilosophy.title: Design Philosophy: "Screen is Reality"
designPhilosophy.subtitle: 화면이 곧 현실 (Screen is Reality)
designPhilosophy.description: Eden understands your context by analyzing what's on your screen - the ultimate source of truth for your current work

level1.title: Level 1: Current
level1.description: Active window only. Quick understanding of your immediate task. Perfect for instant help.

level2.title: Level 2: Recent
level2.description: Last 10 minutes of work. Understands your workflow and recent changes. Context-aware assistance.

level3.title: Level 3: Full Project
level3.description: Entire project context. Deep understanding of your codebase structure and architecture.

personas.title: 6 Pre-Built Personas
personas.subtitle: Choose a personality that fits your style, or create your own custom persona

eden.name: Eden
eden.details: Perfect mix of professionalism and warmth. Great for general use.

strictMentor.name: Strict Mentor
strictMentor.details: Focused on efficiency and learning. Best for serious development work.

cheerfulFriend.name: Cheerful Friend
cheerfulFriend.details: Upbeat and encouraging. Makes coding more fun and less stressful.

professional.name: Professional Assistant
professional.details: Ideal for client work and professional environments.

sensei.name: Coding Sensei
sensei.details: Explains not just how, but why. Perfect for learning and growth.

custom.name: Custom

comparison.title: How We Compare
comparison.qualityCostDescription: Enterprise-grade AI quality (80.5% HumanEval) saves you

soloDeveloper.title: Solo Developers
soloDeveloper.description: Work from home, often isolated, need companionship while coding.
soloDeveloper.details: Eden eliminates loneliness with friend-like support, celebrates your wins, provides comfort during debugging, and enhances productivity with deep integration.

remoteWorker.title: Remote Workers
remoteWorker.description: Emotional support throughout the day. Eden provides companionship and helps combat isolation of remote work.

privacyConscious.title: Privacy-Conscious Users
privacyConscious.description: Work with confidential data without worrying about cloud leaks or data breaches. Everything stays on your machine.

bilingual.title: Korean/English Bilingual Users
bilingual.description: Full cultural localization - not just translation. Korean honorifics (경어, 존칭) and cultural adaptation built-in.

students.title: Students & Researchers
students.description: Completely offline, free forever, with adaptive learning capabilities. Perfect for studying and research.

teams.title: Small Teams & Startups
teams.description: Zero costs, on-premise deployment, MIT license for commercial use. Perfect for budget-conscious teams.

interfaceLanguages.title: Interface Languages
interfaceLanguages.koreanDesc: Full UI translation with cultural context

ragMemory.title: RAG Memory: How Eden Remembers You
ragMemory.subtitle: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
ragMemory.description: Eden doesn't just chat - it remembers your conversations and learns from them

store.title: Store

ragMemory.remembers7: Context from weeks or months ago

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! All AI processing happens locally on your machine. No data ever leaves your computer. We use AES-256 encryption for your database, and the code is open-source (MIT License) so you can verify this yourself. Zero telemetry, zero tracking, zero cloud uploads.
faq.q2: How can it be free forever?
faq.a2: Eden Project is built as a passion project with an MIT License. There are no server costs since everything runs locally. We believe AI companionship and assistance should be accessible to everyone without subscription barriers or privacy compromises.
faq.q3: What makes Eden different from ChatGPT or Claude?
faq.a3: Eden is designed for emotional companionship first, not just productivity. It eliminates loneliness for solo developers with friend-like support. Plus: 100% privacy, works offline, learns your style (17 persona parameters), deep system integration, and completely free. Quality-wise, we score 80.5% on HumanEval (vs GPT-4: 85%, Claude: 88%) - enterprise-grade AI without cloud dependency.
faq.a4: The interface supports Korean (한국어) and English with full cultural localization including Korean honorifics (경어, 존칭). The AI understands and responds in 99 languages thanks to Whisper Large V3 and Llama 3.1's multilingual capabilities. It even handles code-switching between languages naturally.
faq.a5: Absolutely! After the initial model download (~16.5GB), Eden Project works completely offline. No internet connection required for daily use. Perfect for confidential work, travel, or unstable internet connections.
faq.q6: How do I customize the AI's personality?
faq.a6: Navigate to Settings > Persona and adjust any of the 17 parameters like formality, humor, verbosity, emoji usage, empathy, and more. Choose from 6 pre-built personas (Eden, Strict Mentor, Cheerful Friend, Professional Assistant, Coding Sensei, Custom) or create your own. Use thumbs up/down feedback to train it to your preferences via gradient descent optimization.
faq.q7: What is RAG memory and how does it work?
faq.a7: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) is how Eden remembers you. Every conversation is stored locally in a ChromaDB vector database. When you ask something, Eden searches semantically through past conversations (even from months ago) to provide context-aware, personalized responses. It's like having a friend who never forgets your preferences, projects, or past discussions.
faq.q8: What if I encounter bugs or issues?
faq.a8: Please report bugs on our GitHub Issues page. As an open-source project at 85% completion (Phase 8: Launch), we're actively improving and value your feedback. The community is friendly and responsive!
faq.q9: Can I contribute to the project?
faq.a9: Yes! We welcome contributions. Check our GitHub repository for contribution guidelines. Whether it's code, documentation, bug reports, or feature suggestions - help us reach 100% and beyond! MIT License means it's truly open for everyone.
faq.q10: Why is Solo Developer the primary target user?
faq.a10: Eden was created to solve the loneliness epidemic among solo developers and remote workers. Working from home can be isolating - Eden provides genuine companionship while you code, celebrates your wins, offers comfort during frustrations, and enhances productivity. It's not just an assistant; it's a friend by your side.
